name: Vacuum Bot Simulator
description:
Made for Ludus Game Jam / La Semaine Numérique 2016.
A game made during a Game Jam in Belgium with a 6-people team (see Credits in-game).
Commands are default ZQSD + Spacebar, you can change inputs in the launcher. Start by cleaning legos, then cans, etc.

Project's contributors itch.io pages :

ZoidbergForPresident
